Flicker::

Flicker comes inside and sits down next to Rodimus.  "I feel, well, 
sort of useless.  I mean, I'm a technician and all, but you've 
already got Wheeljack to do that stuff.  And from what I've seen, he 
does it better."  He's playing the crowd, so to speak - like a true 
Predacon, Flicker would never really admit that someone else was 
better at something than him.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: Sure, come in.
> Roddy sits on the couch.
> Rodimus Prime: So what did you need to talk about?
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:Flicker::
> 
> "Uh, he's ... not doing too great." Flicker says glumly.  "He's in 
> the CR right now.  I can't figure out what's wrong with him."
> 
> Flicker makes a quick check up and down the hall to make sure 
there's 
> nobody else around.  "There's ... something else I'd like to talk 
> about .... Can I come in?  I'd rather not go broadcasting this if I 
> don't have to."
>
